properties.areaDesc: Block Island Sound; Rhode Island Sound
properties.headline: Gale Warning issued January 4 at 2:58PM EST until January 5 at 4:00PM EST by NWS Boston/Norton MA
properties.description:
* WHAT...Northwest winds 20 to 25 kt with gusts up to 35 kt and
seas 4 to 6 feet expected.

* WHERE...Rhode Island Sound and Block Island Sound.

* WHEN...From 4 AM to 4 PM EST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous seas which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: GALE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TO 4 PM EST SUNDAY
